text: Hagi anante Siria kini ne'mo'a Babiloni rankumate'ene Katama kumate'ene Avama kumate'ene Hamati kumate'ene Sefarvaimi kumate'ma hu'za nemaniza vahera zamavareno, Sameriama me'nea kumatamimpina Israeli vahe'ma nomaniza nompi eme zamatrege'za ana kumatmimpi mani'naze. Ana nehu'za Sameria rankuma'enena eri'za mani'naze.
